title: Cinematic Series Sound Pack
description: With the Cinematic Series Bundle, you can make your audience feel the atmosphere you want.
longDescription: With the Cinematic Series Bundle, you can make your audience feel the atmosphere you want. Cinematic Series Bundle includes sound effects of; cinematic hits, and booms sound effects, stingers sound effects, trailer tools, and much more to find out. With the “Cinematic Series Bundle”, you will have access to designed sound effects, transition sound effects, and explosions sound effects that you need for your project. Cinematic Series Bundle is specifically designed for all your editing needs. This bundle covers all your sound effects needs for any kind of video or project that you are working on
technicalDetails:
Features:

Number of Audio Waves: 218

Number of Audio Cues: 218

Sample rate / bit rate: 24bit – 96kHz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 28 min 55 sec

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation:

https://vadisound.com/sound-effect-bundles/cinematic-series-sfx-bundle/
